title: 33k-Mile 2004 BMW M3 Convertible 6-Speed
description: This 2004 BMW M3 convertible was initially delivered to BMW of Fairfax in Virginia and has 33k miles following history in Virginia and Florida. The car is finished in Silver Gray Metallic over black Nappa leather and is powered by a 3.2-liter inline-six linked with a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential. Features include the Cold Weather Package, a black soft top, 18" M double-spoke wheels, xenon headlights, heated power-adjustable front sport seats, navigation, a Harman Kardon sound system, and automatic climate control. This E46 M3 is now offered by the selling dealer with a window sticker, the owner's manual, a clean Carfax report, and a Pennsylvania title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 33k-Mile 2004 BMW M3 Convertible 6-Speed at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #183,002.
text: This 2004 BMW M3 convertible was initially delivered to BMW of Fairfax in Virginia and has 33k miles following history in Virginia and Florida. The car is finished in Silver Gray Metallic over black Nappa leather and is powered by a 3.2-liter inline-six linked with a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential. Features include the Cold Weather Package, a black soft top, 18″ M double-spoke wheels, xenon headlights, heated power-adjustable front sport seats, navigation, a Harman Kardon sound system, and automatic climate control. This E46 M3 is now offered by the selling dealer with a window sticker, the owner’s manual, a clean Carfax report, and a Pennsylvania title. The car is finished in Silver Gray Metallic (A08) and is equipped with a black convertible soft top as well as xenon headlights, fog lights, rain-sensing windshield wipers, LED tail lights, and quad exhaust outlets. The 18″ M double-spoke Style 67 wheels are mounted with 225/45 front and 255/40 rear Bridgestone Potenza RE980 AS tires that show 2023 and 2024 date codes. The car was factory equipped with Dynamic Stability Control (DSC), and braking is provided by four-wheel ventilated discs. The heated power-adjustable front sport seats and door-panel inserts are upholstered in black Nappa leather, and the cabin features a black dashboard with Brushed Aluminum Shadow trim accents. Interior amenities include cruise control, navigation, Harman Kardon audio, and automatic climate control. The multi-function leather-wrapped steering wheel features M-color stitching and frames a 185-mph speedometer and a tachometer with a variable redline along with gauges for coolant temperature, oil temperature, and fuel level. The digital odometer indicates 33k miles. The 3.2-liter S54 inline-six was factory rated at 333 horsepower and 262 lb-ft of torque. Power is sent to the rear wheels through a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential. The window sticker notes initial delivery to BMW of Fairfax in Virginia and lists factory colors, equipment, and a total suggested retail price of $61,995. html:
This 2004 BMW M3 convertible was initially delivered to BMW of Fairfax in Virginia and has 33k miles following history in Virginia and Florida. The car is finished in Silver Gray Metallic over black Nappa leather and is powered by a 3.2-liter inline-six linked with a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential. Features include the Cold Weather Package, a black soft top, 18″ M double-spoke wheels, xenon headlights, heated power-adjustable front sport seats, navigation, a Harman Kardon sound system, and automatic climate control. This E46 M3 is now offered by the selling dealer with a window sticker, the owner’s manual, a clean Carfax report, and a Pennsylvania title.

The car is finished in Silver Gray Metallic (A08) and is equipped with a black convertible soft top as well as xenon headlights, fog lights, rain-sensing windshield wipers, LED tail lights, and quad exhaust outlets.

The 18″ M double-spoke Style 67 wheels are mounted with 225/45 front and 255/40 rear Bridgestone Potenza RE980 AS tires that show 2023 and 2024 date codes. The car was factory equipped with Dynamic Stability Control (DSC), and braking is provided by four-wheel ventilated discs.

The heated power-adjustable front sport seats and door-panel inserts are upholstered in black Nappa leather, and the cabin features a black dashboard with Brushed Aluminum Shadow trim accents. Interior amenities include cruise control, navigation, Harman Kardon audio, and automatic climate control.

The multi-function leather-wrapped steering wheel features M-color stitching and frames a 185-mph speedometer and a tachometer with a variable redline along with gauges for coolant temperature, oil temperature, and fuel level. The digital odometer indicates 33k miles.

The 3.2-liter S54 inline-six was factory rated at 333 horsepower and 262 lb-ft of torque.

Power is sent to the rear wheels through a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential.

The window sticker notes initial delivery to BMW of Fairfax in Virginia and lists factory colors, equipment, and a total suggested retail price of $61,995.

The Carfax report is free of accidents or other reported damage.
